price: Tuzoheza rero Tubwire ibiremwa ido n'ido y’ivyo bakoze, Twisunze ubumenyi Dufise ku vyo bakoze vyose mu kwubahiriza amabwirizwa yacu; kira noneho, ntitwigeze Tuba kure yabo mu bihe vyose;
arabic: فَلَنَقُصَّنَّ عَلَيۡهِم بِعِلۡمٖۖ وَمَا كُنَّا غَآئِبِينَ

meta.transliteration: falanaquṣṣanna ʿalayhim biʿil'min wamā kunnā ghāibīna
